global.no_electricity:
It seems you are out of electricity. 
Note that this information may not be too accurate

onboarding.title_1:
When is the next 
Eneo Power Outage?

notifications.outage_out_description: You may be out of electricity today!
notifications.outage_in_description: No electricity work has has been programmed around you. You might not experience outage today!

permissions.location_description: We need access to your location so that we can find outages at and around you
permissions.notification_description: We need access to your notification so that we can keep you informed outages at and around you

outage.no_outages_planned: No construction program planned in your area

settings.about_desc: This app is a tentative solution to the problem of power outages in Cameroon. It is not affiliated with Eneo Cameroon.
settings.share_desc:
Hi 
Checkout this app that shows eneo outages in Cameroon!
settings.donate_desc: Donating to this project helps us build an AI that can better predict power outage in Cameroon.
settings.disclaimer_desc: The information provided here is provided by the Alert Eneo API and is not guaranteed to be accurate.

donate.support_desc: Supporting us, helps us build a better AI for predicting electricity outages in Cameroon
donate.thanks: Thank you for donating {amount} to our project!
